cast.original_title: The School for Good and Evil
cast.overview: Best friends Sophie and Agatha navigate an enchanted school for young heroes and villains — and find themselves on opposing sides of the battle between good and evil.
cast.title: The School for Good and Evil

details.biography: Christopher William Young (born October 24th, 1994) is an English actor, known for A Midsummer Night's Dream (2019), Endeavour (2012) and Shadow and Bone (2021-). He began his career in theatre, earning an Ian Charleson Award nomination. His films include The School for Good and Evil (2022) and The Origin (2022).
details.name: Kit Young
